_source.text: 12 oz elbow wheat pasta is better to use 3/4cup milk 3 - 4 tablespoons sugar or substitue cucumber 1 large tomatoe 1 large pepper salt parsely flakes cletery flakes shredded carrots (if you would like)

text: 12 oz elbow **wheat** pasta **is** **better** to use 3/4cup milk 3 - 4 tablespoons sugar or substitue **cucumber**
